subject: The Electric Tram To Kew
text:
Through the swift night 
I go to my love. 
Tram bells are joy bells, 
Bidding us move 
On a golden path 
Beneath balls of fire 
Up hill and down dale, 
To o'ertake desire. 
Past the old shops 
That my childhood knew, 
Past hidden houses 
And fields of dew 
Lovely and secret 
As thou, my friend, 
Who art all heaven 
At journey's end.
